DOUBLE_TIME.name: Double Time
DOUBLE_TIME.description: Double the duration of Tactical Sprint, increase crouch movement speed by 30%

TRACKER.name: Tracker
TRACKER.description: Enemies leave behind a footprint trail and enemy death markers are visible. Eliminations are hidden from the enemy team

SPOTTER.name: Spotter
SPOTTER.description: Spot enemy equipment through walls. Aiming down sights highlights them for your team. Hack enemy Claymore, Proximity Mines, C4 and Trophy Systems

GHOST.name: Ghost
GHOST.description: Undetectable by UAVs, Portable Radars and Heartbeat Sensors
